title.narrative: F.a: Actions for Advancing Freedom of Freed Haliyas, Kamaiyas and Kamlaharis

description.narrative: Freed Haliyas, ex-Kamaiyas and Kamlaris (HaKK) have not yet fully realised the true sense of freedom. They are aware but still lacking desired level of empowerment. Thousands of right-holders are still denied their rights and entitlements. Therefore, right -holders need to be further supported to empower them to claim and enjoy their rights. The duty-bearers require enough support in formulation policies, strategies, guidelines and implement those aiming the just rehabilitation of freed HaKK. The project, th us, focuses on livelihood, education, capacity building and advocacy to facilitate duty-bearers? and right-holders? efforts to end this bondage system permanently. The overall goal of the project is to enhance the dignified living of freed Haliyas, Ex- Kam aiyas and Kamlaris. The project aims at advancing socio-economic condition of freed Haliya, ex- Kamaiyas and Kamlaris enhancing their access to livelihood assets and promoting equality and non-discrimination Expected results:? Increased access of the right s-holders (i.e. freed Haliyas, ex-Kamaiyas and Kamlaris), their groups and associations to services and resources, and fulfillment of their rights ? Enhanced access of the rights-holders to resilient livelihood and employment opportunities ? Increased acce ss of children and youth among the rights-holders to uninterrupted quality education ? Improved harmony and relations between freed bonded labourers and their ex-mastersRights-holders /beneficiaries: Freed Haliyas, ex- Kamaiyas and Kamlaris.Implementing pa rtner: The Lutheran World Federation Nepal (LWF Nepal)
